Name: xenon and krypton purification, air separation | krypton, gaseous | EN15804GD, U
Category: C:Manufacturing/20:Manufacture of chemicals and chemical products/201:Manufacture of basic chemicals, fertilizers and nitrogen compounds, plastics/2011:Manufacture of basic chemicals
Description: Kr-Xe-concentrate with 99.7% O2 is obtained from a side column of large air separation plants. Processes as purification and further distillation and the achieved yield may vary. Data represents an average process.
